name: Lemon Curd Chia Pudding
description: Lemon Curd Chia Pudding. Easy 5 Ingredient Thick Lemon Coconut Milk Turmeric Pudding with Chia seeds. This zesty pudding is a refreshing treat for Summer. Serve with whipped coconut cream. Vegan gluten-free nut-free soy-free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: Zest of a large lemon (or 2 small lemons)
13.5 or 15 oz can full fat coconut milk (about 1.5 cups)
3 tbsp or more sweetener (I use raw sugar)
3 tbsp or more chia seeds (5 to 6 tbsp for well set pudding)

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the lemon zest, juice, coconut milk, water, sweetener, salt and turmeric until well combined. Add chia seeds and pulse once or twice to distribute the chia seeds well.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the lemon zest, juice, coconut milk, water, sweetener, salt and turmeric until well combined. Add chia seeds and pulse once or twice to distribute the chia seeds well.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust sweet and tang. Add more lemon juice or zest to taste and mix/blend in.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust sweet and tang. Add more lemon juice or zest to taste and mix/blend in.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the mixture into glasses. Chill overnight in the refrigerator. Stir once after an hour or so to distribute the chia seeds if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with whipped coconut cream and lemon zest and serve.
